Aaaand the #TCAs2012 onslaught begins. Hope you're prepared, Twitter.

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) July 21, 2012

this makes us happy ---> RT @burleythekoala: Soon...

— PBS (@PBS) July 14, 2012

"Soul Food - It looks good, it smells good, it tastes good." says director Byron Hurt. I'm getting the wrong takeaway here. #TCAs12

— Daniel Fienberg (@TheFienPrint) July 21, 2012

Will PBS edit Soul Food Junkies to include pork rinds as reality TV weapon? (Pre-#bb14 ejection, Willie threw these: http://t.co/60RUStIi)

Lil' Wayne and Mary Louise Parker apparently have the same philosophy of asparagus. #TCAs2012

"Soul Food Junkies" Take-Away: Mary-Louise Parker is smart, but probably lame to go out to eat with. #TCAs12 #pbs

"Soul Food Junkies" Panel Takeaway - Do NOT give Mary-Louise Parker's children M&Ms. Or SKITTLES. #tcas12 #pbs

Landed in L.A.; hit by unexplained inclination to file all #TCAs12 pieces under the headline "Hix Nix Stix Pix."

Next up: CEO Paula Kerger, who will presumably be asked about some good and bad things about PBS's week in the news.

Watching Paula Karger avoid talking directly about what happened with Fred Willard is like listening to your mom give a sex talk. #TCAs2012

PBS is airing the entire Ring Cycle this fall. Considering their devotion to viral video, it will likely be in two-minute chunks. #tcas12

Paula Kerger cites 58 Emmy nominations as a reason for continued federal funding of PBS. If Downton wins, the GOP will finally be convinced!

"If anyone out there has a great idea for an American drama series..." Well, Paula Kerger, there's this mystery-solving chef... #tcas12 #pbs

Social media is what made "Downton Abbey" the phenomenon it is, PBS CEO Paula Kerger says. Mr. Bates was tweeting the whole thing. #tcas12

Kerger is now giving credit for #DowntonAbbey's success to social media. IT WAS I. I CREATED THIS. I CAN DESTROY IT TOO! #pbs #tcas12 #mars

Clip package for Nature's "Animal Odd Couple" featured a deer licking a puppy and a monkey riding a dog. I want to watch NOW.

"We have one baby with a detachable willy." ULTIMATE #TCAS12 OUT OF CONTEXT QUOTE!
